item.title: Google TV gets a Gemini glow-up, with a ton of new upgrades
item.description: Google’s new Gemini features for Google TV make your television smarter, more conversational, and surprisingly creative.

item.title: Waymo is rebranding its Zeekr robotaxi
MiroMind’s MiroThinker 1.5 delivers trillion-parameter performance from a 30B model — at 1/20th the cost
item.description: Joining the ranks of a growing number of smaller, powerful reasoning models is MiroThinker 1.5 from MiroMind, with just 30 billion parameters, compared to the hundreds of billions or trillions used by leading foundation large language models (LLMs).But MiroThinker 1.5 stands out among these smaller reasoners for one major reason: it offers agentic research capabilities rivaling trillion-parameter competitors like Kimi K2 and DeepSeek, at a fraction of the inference cost.The release marks a milestone in the push toward efficient, deployable AI agents. Enterprises have long been forced to choose...

item.title: Dangbei S8 Ultra Max : le projecteur ultra lumineux qui pourrait imposer un nouveau standard pour le home cinéma HDR
item.description: Avec ses 6200 lumens ISO annoncés et la compatibilité Dolby Vision / HDR10+, le Dangbei S8 Ultra Max est annoncé lors du CES 2026 comme un projecteur concept taillé pour les très grandes images lumineuses à domicile, pensé pour rivaliser avec les modèles home cinéma les plus ambitieux du moment. Reste à voir s’il sera distribué en France…

item.title: I just watched Mammotion's new flagship lawnbot scale an astroturf mountain, and it was mesmerizing
item.description: The LUBA 3 creates a live 3D map of your yard, and can make mowing smart decisions in an instant

item.title: Roborock just introduced an innovative new robot vac mopping system — and it looks seriously good
item.description: The Saros 20 Sonic is designed to deliver efficient, precise, edge-to-edge mopping
